question.questionText: Why is it important to use a standard unit when making a measurement?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: So people know exactly what the measurement means. A standard is necessary so everyone measures using the same unit and everyone gets the same measurement.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Because you could not make measurement without a standard unit.
If you have a standard measurement you can get the correct answer and you do not have the wrong answer.
We use a standard unit so we do not get the measurement wrong.
Because it is a standard unit.
